name: VWBugReporter
description:
Integrate this pod in Testflight releases to get a more detailed Jira issue reports more easily.

                   Testers can shake their iDevice to create a Jira Bug report and VWBugReporter will automatically attach a zip file containing the following files:
                   * previous crash reports using PLCrashReporter
                   * CocoaLumberjack log files
                   * your sqlite database stored in Documents
                   * a detailed hardware description using DeviceUtil
                   * depends on Jira (Cloud or Server) with JIRAConnect enabled
